newsitem.title: USA: Boston Acoustics names A. Kotsatos as CEO.
newsitem.headline: Boston Acoustics names A. Kotsatos as CEO.

text.p: Boston Acoustics Inc said Monday it named Andrew Kotsatos as chairman and chief executive officer.
The positions were previously held by Francis Reed, who died Nov. 16.
Kotsatos, who was also named treasurer of the company's board, founded Boston Acoustics with Reed in 1979.
